looks_good_easy.pre: Tap once on all tiles with at least one building.
looks_good_easy.post_correct: Great. Swipe left and let's have a look a some more difficult examples.
looks_good_easy.post_wrong: Oh no. Make sure to map all buildings. Swipe left to see more examples.
